Header.title: Welcome to LATADOS Dancing School
Header.paragraph: Dance studio managed by Shay Greenberg - Israeli champion in ballroom and Latino American dances.

About.paragraph: Shay Grinberg - Israeli champion in ballroom and Latino American dances.

Features.title: Children's/Adult's group
Features.text: Fun classes teaching kids and adults coordination and teamwork through dance.

Features.title: Groom-bride dances
Features.text: A romantic, choreographed dance for couples to shine on their special day.

Features.title: Bar/Bat mitzva dances
Features.text: Lively routines like cha-cha add fun and energy to the celebration.

Features.title: Private Lessons
Features.text: Personalized coaching to master ballroom techniques and build confidence.
